text: In production, as a junior or mid artist you hardly have chance to use your scripting skills since those pipeline tasks more likely being done by senior artists or pipeline TD.
I like programming so I tried use it for my daily tasks, but the first thing is get a good demoreel to show.
hey yinghao , thank you so much for your rewiew i am happy that you think this  project is valid because i really want do it.
